markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Giant Silverfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1615)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Some silverfish can grow as large as a pig, particularly in magic colleges and ancient vault-libraries, where they terrify hapless students and destroy precious tomes. Popular academic lore attributes their unusual size to a steady diet of spellbooks.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Silverfish_GiantSilverfish.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Giant Silverfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1615)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 17

**Wriggle** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature the giant silverfish can see targets it with an attack; **Effect** The giant silverfish gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack resolves, the silverfish Steps.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +8,
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Voracious Consumption**   (1 minute) A giant silverfish consumes up to 1 Bulk of paper, cloth, or similar material. It can consume up to 8 Bulk each day

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-289" />
name: Giant Silverfish
